text: Enzo Garinei (4 May 1926 â€“ 25 August 2022) was an Italian actor. His career began in 1949. Garinei was born in Rome, Italy. Garinei was also known for his roles in Toto, Peppino and the Fanatics, No, the Case Is Happily Resolved and Banana Joe. Garinei was also known for being the Italian voice dub of Sherman Hemsley in the American sitcom The Jeffersons. Garinei died on 25 August 2022 in Rome at the age of 96.Morto Enzo Garinei, una vita tra teatro, cinema e tv ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Enzo Garinei
